text: Goniothalamus majestatis is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Sulawesi in Indonesia. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Goniothalamus majestatis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
